meanings.definition: Of or relating to a climax
meanings.sent1: The movie's climactic scene had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The climactic moment in the story was when the hero defeated the villain.
meanings.sent3: The climactic ending left the audience cheering for more.
meanings.sent4: The climactic battle between good and evil was epic.
meanings.sent5: The climactic reveal of the mystery shocked everyone.

meanings.definition: Reaching a climax or point of highest intensity
meanings.sent1: The concert's climactic performance brought the crowd to their feet.
meanings.sent2: The climactic chapter of the book had a surprising twist.
meanings.sent3: The climactic race between the tortoise and the hare was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The climactic showdown between the rivals was intense.
meanings.sent5: The climactic moment of the game determined the winner.
